auto-connect-dialog-detail: Unless you disconnect from this VPN server, the VPN will automatically connect next time you restart your device.
error-feedback-submission: Sorry, we were unable to submit your feedback. Please check that you are connected to the internet and try again.
error-invalid-access-key: Invalid access key. Please try again, or submit feedback for help.
error-server-incompatible: Sorry, this access key is not compatible with this version of the VPN.
error-timeout: Something seems to be taking longer than expected. Quitting and restarting may help. If this happens again, please submit feedback.
error-unexpected: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Quitting and restarting may help. If this happens again, please submit feedback.
error-shadowsocks-unsupported-cipher: The server you requested to add uses an unsafe cipher ({cipher}). Please contact your server admin.
feedback-language-disclaimer: Please note that our team is only able to answer feedback in English.
feedback-privacy: Your feedback, your email address (if provided), and additional information referred to in the {privacyPolicyLinkOpen}Data Collection Policy{privacyPolicyLinkClose} will be sent to the the VPN team. Please do not include personal information in your feedback.
feedback-thanks: Thanks for helping us improve! We love hearing from you.
non-system-vpn-warning-detail: Most browsers connect automatically with the VPN, some do not.
outline-plugin-error-admin-permissions: the VPN needs admin permissions in order to be initialized. If you don't have admin permissions, please try again after restarting your computer or ask your system administrator for help.
outline-plugin-error-antivirus: It seems like your antivirus software is preventing us from successfully connecting.
outline-plugin-error-invalid-server-cred: It seems like your access key is not valid. If this happens again, please contact your server admin.
outline-plugin-error-routing-tables: We were not able to configure your routing tables successfully. If this happens again, please reach out to us.
outline-plugin-error-server-unreachable: We can’t seem to connect to your server. Please check that you are connected to the internet and try again.
outline-plugin-error-system-configuratio: Sorry, it looks like the VPN is not properly installed. Please try installing it again. If that doesn’t work, please submit feedback through the app.
outline-plugin-error-udp-forwarding-not-: It seems like this server doesn’t support UDP forwarding. If this happens again, please contact your server admin.
outline-plugin-error-unsupported-routing: It seems like another VPN is active. Please disconnect it and try again.
outline-plugin-error-vpn-permission-not-: the VPN needs your permission to set up a VPN connection to the server. Please try again, or submit feedback if you need help.
outline-services-installation-confirmati: We will initialize the VPN, which may require admin permissions. Would you like to proceed?
outline-services-installation-failed: Unfortunately we are not able to initialize the VPN, please submit feedback through the app.
outline-services-installed: the VPN has been successfully initialized, please try again to connect to the server.
privacy-text: Some technical information is sent if you submit feedback, if there’s an app error or crash, or if your server administrator opts in to share anonymous server usage data.
privacy-title: the VPN will never collect your personal information
server-add-instructions: Copy and paste an access key to add a server.
server-add-invalid: {openLine}Invalid access key.{closeLine}Enter a valid access key (ss://) to add a server.
server-create-your-own:
Don’t have an access key?
Contact our admins.
server-create-your-own-zero-state:
Don’t have a server?
Contact our admins.
server-detected: Please confirm that you want to add this server.
update-downloaded: An updated version of the VPN has been downloaded. It will be installed when you restart the VPN.
